results.content: Only the install and start / stop is shown. The essential parts of the CDN are excluded. I had hoped for more here. It is not shown what to do with the "/etc/varnish/secret" file, because without it varnish will not start. The admin console is also not mentioned. I could have googled it all.

results.content: I've never used a cache server before, but I'll definetly give it a try now, thanks Jason! If you are looking for easy to follow instructions in a Linux environment this is an excellent course! I'd recommend checking out Jason's other course: 'Mean stack for beginners'.
